traits.name: Rampage
entries: When the garmyr reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the garmyr can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spear
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1 damage) piercing damage.
